alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 1:02PM EDT until April 08 at 10:35PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River near Carsonville Hwy. 19 affecting Talbot, Upson, Taylor and Crawford Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Flint River near Carsonville Hwy. 19. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins along the river in the woodlands and low lying areas of fields upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 19. The water level will reach the top of a boat ramp by the bridge on the Taylor County side of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM EDT Friday the stage was 19.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 5.5 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 18 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
